description:
Happiness Is All About You is a course that shows how anyone can be happy with where they are by making an adjustment to the way they think and start to see and enjoy life a lot better.

The course covers 6 sections. 1. Introduction. 2. Choosing to be happy. 3. What's going on with me? 4. Can i really be happy? 5. Value systems. 6. Closing thoughts.
title: Happiness Is All About You
